# .github/workflows/update-stars.yml
name: Update Starred Projects

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 6 * * *'  # æ¯å¤©æ—©ä¸Š6ç‚¹è¿è¡Œ

    steps:

    - name: Setup Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.11'
        
    - name: Cache dependencies
      uses: actions/cache@v3
      with:
        path: ~/.cache/pip
        key: ${{ runner.os }}-pip-${{ hashFiles('requirements.txt') }}
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt
        
    - name: Run star summary
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      run: |
        python -m src.cli.main generate --format both --verbose
        
    - name: Commit and push changes
      run: |
        git config --local user.email "action@github.com"
        git config --local user.name "GitHub Action"
        git add output/
        git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "Auto-update starred projects [$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')]"
        git push
